snippet: Republicans showed little sign of finding any common ground with Attorney General Loretta E. Lynch on solutions to gun violence.
abstract: Atty Gen Loretta E Lynch, during first congressional hearing on Pres Obama's executive orders aimed at tightening gun restrictions, voices support for Obama's effort and for needed funding; Senate Republicans say they will try to block Obama's effort.
lead_paragraph: Republicans showed little sign of finding any common ground with Attorney General Loretta E. Lynch on solutions to gun violence.

headline.main: Attorney General Seeks Funding for Tighter Gun Rules
headline.print_headline: Attorney General Seeks Funding for Tighter Gun Rules
